did.unittitle: Formal portrait of a man wearing traditional Native American dress. The back of the photograph identifies him as: Koosta. Chief of the Kootena: Indians, Palson, Montana. Koostata is 68 years of age. Son of the famous Chief Eneas, and grandson of chief Bapsiste, who signed the treaty of Hell Gate, 1855, between the U.S. Government and the Allied Tribes of the Flashed Reservation
